title: Enlightenment shapes policies of French Rev

content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. How and to what extent did Enlightenment ideas about religion and society shape the policies of the French Revolution in the period 1789 to 1799 ?

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. How and to what extent did Enlightenment ideas about religion and society shape the policies of the French Revolution in the period 1789 to 1799 ?

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
